duties_responsibilities.duty: Effectively lead, develop, and support the Stylist sales team to meet and exceed sales plans and productivity targets.
Build customer traffic and deliver 5-star customer service while resolving customer issues and managing customer service strategies.
Maintain store-standards to support an exceptional customer shopping experience, manage inventory, and execute monthly Visual Merchandising Plans.
Lead and inspire Stylists to exceed sales productivity goals, bridal conversion, and add-ons goals by coaching, mentoring, and recognizing great performance.
Participate in weekly management meetings, recruiting efforts, and talent/new hire recommendations, as directed by the Store Manager.
Complete all action plans on a quarterly basis with the Store Manager and focus on development and learning for continuous improvement.
Manage expense budgets, loss prevention, security processes, and policies at all times while executing effective scheduling practices to maximize sales and customer service.
Participate in developing employees to their full potential through coaching, training, and addressing employee issues, as well as completing all training as assigned for on-going development.
Responsible to ensure that store payroll does not exceed monthly budget, and execute all the training for the Stylist, Dress Specialist, and Bridal Show Reps.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or degree. Two years prior retail experience, preferably in a supervisory role in an apparel or specialty store environment. Prior experience with computerized POS system.
